Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm talking about the <clr:0000>blizzard <clr:ffff>outside.<sp:0:4:0>This vicious storm began when so many
other terrible things started, and it hasn't
stopped yet.
It's impossible to walk around in this
kind of <clr:0000>blizzard<clr:ffff>, so I've been forced to
stay here at the stable.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>The vicious <clr:0000>blizzard<clr:ffff> outside started when
so many other awful things began going
wrong. Maybe it will never stop.
But the <clr:0000>village where the Rito live<clr:ffff>—to the
west of here—is in a dire situation.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>They can't get enough food in this
extreme cold. There's less and less
for them to eat.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>But the <clr:0000>village where the Rito live<clr:ffff>—off
to the west of here—is in an even
worse situation.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>In this extreme cold and in this
blizzard, they can't get enough
food to feed themselves.
The villagers there are desperate to
figure out what's gone wrong with the
weather and how to feed everyone.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Hello there...<sp:5:0:0> Still stranded here, as you
can see.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>If you're going to head to <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>,
prepare carefully before you go.
